http://www.t-dose.org/
Playlist T-Dose2013  http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLBZBIkixHEidp0CvKAakVxKr6_WcWvFur

26 October 2013

T-DOSE 2013 conference,
Speaker: Eugene Panferov,  New SQL Security Approach

There is a way to significantly improve SQL security with very few changes to the existing systems.
The following essay describes my proposal:
http://file.bestmx.net/ee/articles/sql-security.pdf

also see:
T-DOSE 2013 Open Source, Evgeny Panferov, Building New SQL 
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DuDynhuL0QI

more at:
http://www.t-dose.org/2013/talks/new-sql-security-approach
First 7 minutes of this recording are missing.
title: T-DOSE 2013 Open Source, Eugene Panferov, New SQL Security Approach
